data.name: DIVISION
data.detailed_description:
The whole world bacame strange, the place we live seem to be falling apart.
DIVISION is a sci-fi adventure game. A story about a girl named YI.
The stange machines are coming, YI knows that she has to leave. She doesn't know that will be an arduous journey, she doesn't even know the outside world was crazier than she thought, and she has to find her family.


Features

  • 2.5D Side-Scrolling Sci-Fi Adventure，a bizarre and motley world waiting to be explored，find the truth of the world.
  • Unique art style, and many puzzles that blend into the story and environment
  • The mechanics of the game are story-based, and we can't impose superpowers on a normal girl, so there's a lot of variety in the gameplay, especially when you get the key items in the story
  • Face the obstacles of your journey and fight against evil mechanical creatures, either by stealth or destroying them

data.short_description: DIVISION is a sci-fi adventure game. The whole world bacame strange, the place we live seem to be falling apart. A girl named YI will embark on an incredible journey.
